title: Gate [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Peter Carstairs, Karen Radzyner and New South Wales Film and Television Office
brief_description: Over the duration of a smoko, 3 sheep station workers (Joel Edgerton, Tony Ryan and Brett Wood) deliberate over which one of them left the gate open and allowed 800 sheep to escape. With remarkable ingenuity and careful questioning, they get to the bottom of the matter.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Carstairs, Karen Radzyner and New South Wales Film and Television Office
